bibl.title: The Speaker(s) of Aeschylus, "Diktyoulkoi" fr. 47a Radt (=P. Oxy. 2161) 820-32.
bibl.note: Stefan Radt, TrGF III 47a = P. Oxy. XVIII, 2161 (= Pack2 26). The examination of 820-32 argues for a change of speaker at 827, from one satyr to another.
Halleran M.R., The Speaker(s) of Aeschylus, "Diktyoulkoi" fr. 47a Radt (=P. Oxy. 2161) 820-32.
